items.headline: Starbucks notches surprise same-store sales gain, but Wall Street wants more specifics on the future
items.summary_en: Starbucks put up its first quarterly same-store sales gain in nearly two years, helped by better morning staffing and new protein drinks. But the coffee chain warned its turnaround would be a “multiyear” effort, and said it would provide a fuller financial outlook in January.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.
